title: DVD Santa Version 3.11 Retail
description:
Full retail version of DVD santa

DVD Santa is an All-in-One software that lets you copy, create, convert and burn your DVD movies. It can copy 9GB double layer DVD movies into a 4.7GB DVD-R disc, can turn your photos into DVD movies with Hollywood style motion effects, can convert other video formats(avi, wmv, vob, asf, DivX, Mpeg,...) into DVD video, can transfer miniDV camcorder tapes directly to DVD video. dvdSanta is extremely easy to use, fast and powerful. 

Software Features:
1.Easy to use interface: Intuitive user interface that requires no technical knowledge whatsoever. 
2.Converts and burns video files directly into DVD movies so that you can watch them on TV. 
3.Can mix multiple video files into one DVD disc. 
4.Converts photo files into DVD movies, with 35 transition effects, pan and zoom motions, background musics and narrations. 
5.Can automatically sync the background music with photo slide shows. 
6.Real-time captures and transforms miniDV camcorder tapes directly to DVD video format 
7.Can fit 9GB double layer DVD movies into 4.7GB single layer DVD disc. 
8.Burns DVD ISO Image or DVD VIDEO_TS folders to DVD 
9.Auto-Rate-Controller technology maximizes disc space by squeezing the highest quality video onto a disc. 
10.Supports major video formats such as AVI, WMV, ASF, MPG, VOB... 
11.Supports major photo formats such as JPG, PNG, BMP... 
12.Supports major audio formats such as WAV, MP3, WMA... 
13.Supports DVD+R/RW, DVD-R/RW format discs and burners. 
14.Supports 4:3 and 16:9 video aspect ratio 
15.Supports both NTSC and PAL video standard 
16.Supports Interlaced and Progressive Sources 
17.Supports output to hard drive 
18.Intergrated High Speed DVD MPEG-2 Encoder
